articles.author: Kevin Liptak
articles.title: As Iran talks drag on, questions emerge over how long Trump will indulge diplomacy - CNN
articles.description: Iranian and American negotiators departed their indirect talks in Geneva with an agreement to keep talking, doing little to ease fears of an impending regional war.
articles.content: After passing notes for three-and-a-half hours Tuesday, Iranian and American negotiators departed their indirect talks in Geneva with an agreement to keep talking. What theyre talking about, exactly,… [+7437 chars]
